## Rendering all quarto documents in the correct order.

```{r}
library(here)
library(quarto)


render_to_results("data_loading")
render_to_results("01_Preprosessing")
render_to_results("021_age")
render_to_results("022_education")
render_to_results("023_income")
render_to_results("024_race")
render_to_results("025_sex")
render_to_results("026_diagnosis")
render_to_results("03_integration")
```

Finally the presentation is rendered

```{r}
quarto_render(here("doc/presentation.qmd"))

```
